desc: Six dried wild food products available in retail and wholesale quantities. I (Scott) am born and raised in Kelowna, BC and has been picking mushrooms for over 20 years. This region is also my 'patch' and I have been harvesting and selling to local chefs and markets since 2010. Consistency and quality!

layout.text: Hello and Welcome from Scott Moran

Thank you for dropping by! This is my online store dedicated to the sale of dried wild produce. Currently, I have six products available; four types of mushrooms and two plant varieties. Born and raised in the Okanagan Valley, I have been picking and selling fresh and dried wild produce for over ten years. The Okanagan is still home and where I do the majority of my foraging.
Find me every Saturday at the Kelowna Farmers and Crafters Market between April 1st and October 31st from 8:00 - 1:00
